ygData.subject: Organizing the 50 Project
ygData.msgSnippet: I d like to start working on the new 50 Project, but we need some organization. 1st)If you forgot what the 50 project was, it s an attempt to create 50

Subject: Organizing the 50 Project
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=62491402
X-Yahoo-Profile: alternate_dph


I'd like to start working on the new 50 Project, but we need some
organization.

1st)If you forgot what the 50 project was, it's an attempt to create
50 brand-new scenarios as an alternate starting point for the game. 
You could start with scenario #1 of this new set right from the beginning.

2nd)Somebody needs to be in charge of plot.  Literally, based on
comments about my set of 50, I'm unavailable for this job.

This job means laying out the plot to give the scenarios purpose -
what goes on between scenarios.

3rd)Somebody needs to be in charge of overall scenario design - this
isn't creativity, but making sure things like there is room to walk
around and fight battles in tight areas and all keys can be reached
unless that's not the point.  I'm nominating myself for this job.

4th)Somebody needs to be in charge of the scenario variety and
creativity - This is about making sure that too many scenarios don't
look almost alike and trying to keep everybody from reusing the same
plans for creating scenarios.  I don't want to fill this job since I'm
already doing another.

5th)We need at least 3 people to actually create the scenarios.  I
plan on doing so.  We need at least two others.
